text: Today, during training time, I tried meditating...

Oh, you're doing that too?
How was it?

Clearing my mind surprisingly
happened quite quickly...

I'm usually quite
noisy in my head...!

I noticed that I'm constantly thinking, seeing, hearing...
Always busy and moving.

But when I tried to stop all that with meditation,
it felt like a refreshing breeze blew through my mind.
Seems like it has a good effect on Haruki.

I often get anxious
and flustered before work...

Maybe trying it before work
could be a good idea.

Yeah... Performing at your best comes from
being relaxed and natural.

For example, when I get on stage or...
if I could be like that ......

To get there...
We definitely need...

Exactly!
I need to work hard to get there soon!
